item.title: Save Battery Life on Android
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: {{ youtube MU_sKjN6rz4 {} Every year, smartphones get better and better. We live in the age where the average smartphone has better specs than a two year old computer. Despite all of this technological innovation, battery life is still a major concern for many consumers. It’s simple, we need longer lasting batteries. Unfortunately, until there is a scientific breakthrough with battery technology, this is unlikely to change. Fortunately, there is a way that you can get the most out of your battery.
